alert.note: Alert for Koochiching (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 7:06PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Koochiching County through 730 PM CDT... At 704 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles north of Big Falls, to 8 miles northwest of Kelliher, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pelland and International Falls. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
